title: Session 01 — Trouble in Bryn Shander
body:
# Recap

The party arrived in **Bryn Shander** during heavy snow. Rumors mentioned giants harassing the Ten-Towns.

### Key Events
- Met Sheriff *Markham Southwell* and Speaker *Duvessa Shane*.
- A frost giant scouting party searched for *Artus Cimber*.
- Party defended the walls; townsfolk thankful.

### Hooks
- Follow leads on **Artus Cimber**.
- Seek out the wandering giant ally **Harshnag**.

title: Harshnag the Grim (NPC)
body:
A battle-hardened **frost giant** who opposes the Ordning's chaos.

- Favors mortals who stand against monstrous giants.
- Often roams the **Spine of the World**.
- Can guide the party to the **Eye of the All-Father**.

title: Location — Eye of the All-Father
body:
Ancient giant temple hidden in the mountains.

- Houses the oracle of **Annam**.
- Answers questions when proper rites are observed.
- Crucial to understanding the **Ordning** upheaval.

title: House Rule — Critical Hits
body: **Crits:** Roll damage dice twice (`2d`) + modifiers once. Brutal Critical features add extra dice after doubling.

title: Faction — Harpers
body: A semi-secret network promoting equality and opposing tyranny. Potential patrons or quest-givers in the North.

title: SRD 5.1 Attribution
body: Select spell summaries are adapted from the D&D 5.1 System Reference Document, released under Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 by Wizards of the Coast.

title: Acid Splash
body:
# Acid Splash (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Dex save by one or two creatures within 5 ft of each other; a target takes 1d6 acid damage (scales with level).

title: Mage Hand
body:
# Mage Hand (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

Create a spectral hand to manipulate objects (up to 10 lb). Can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 lb.

title: Guidance
body:
# Guidance (Divination cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Touch a willing creature; once before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to one ability check.

title: Prestidigitation
body:
# Prestidigitation (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Up to 1 hour

Perform minor magical effects: clean/soil, flavor, light/snuff a small flame, create a trinket, etc.

title: Shield
body:
# Shield (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when hit or targeted by Magic Missile)
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

An invisible barrier gives +5 AC until start of your next turn; you also take no damage from Magic Missile.

title: Cure Wounds
body:
# Cure Wounds (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

A creature you touch regains 1d8 + your spellcasting modifier HP (more when cast at higher levels).

title: Bless
body:
# Bless (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of holy water)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Up to three creatures gain +1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws (more targets when cast at higher levels).

title: Misty Step
body:
# Misty Step (2nd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Self
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

title: Fireball
body:
# Fireball (3rd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 150 ft
Components: V,S,M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
Duration: Instant

A 20-foot-radius explosion deals 8d6 fire damage (Dex save for half). Damage increases by 1d6 per slot above 3rd.

title: Counterspell
body:
# Counterspell (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when a creature within 60 ft casts a spell)
Range: 60 ft
Components: S
Duration: Instant

Interrupt a creature in the process of casting. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, it fails; otherwise make an ability check.

title: Blade Ward
body:
# Blade Ward (Abjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from weapon attacks until the end of your next turn.

title: Chill Touch
body:
# Chill Touch (Necromancy cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

Ranged spell attack; 1d8 necrotic damage and no healing; target is a ghostly skeletal hand clinging to it until your next turn (undead have disadvantage on attack rolls against you).

title: Dancing Lights
body:
# Dancing Lights (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (phosphorus, wychwood, or glowworm)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Create up to four torch-sized lights that shed dim light; they can move and combine into a glowing humanoid form.

title: Druidcraft
body:
# Druidcraft (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant or up to 1 minute

Whispering to nature produces minor effects: predict weather, create sensory effects, light/snuff a candle, or cause a flower to bloom.

title: Eldritch Blast
body:
# Eldritch Blast (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Make a ranged spell attack for 1d10 force damage. Beams increase with level and can target the same or different creatures.

title: Fire Bolt
body:
# Fire Bolt (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Ranged spell attack; 1d10 fire damage; ignites flammable unattended objects.

title: Friends
body:
# Friends (Enchantment cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: S,M (cosmetics)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

You gain advantage on Charisma checks directed at one non-hostile creature. Afterward, it realizes you used magic and may become hostile.

title: Light
body:
# Light (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,M (firefly or phosphorescent moss)
Duration: 1 hour

Object sheds bright light in a 20‑ft radius (dim light +20 ft). If object is worn/carried, save negates.

title: Mending
body:
# Mending (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (two lodestones)
Duration: Instant

Repairs a break or tear in an object (no larger than 1 foot in any dimension).

title: Message
body:
# Message (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (copper wire)
Duration: 1 round

Point at a creature and whisper a message; it can reply in a whisper only you can hear.

title: Minor Illusion
body:
# Minor Illusion (Illusion cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: S,M (fleece)
Duration: 1 minute

Create a sound or an image of an object (5‑ft cube). Investigation check can reveal the illusion.

title: Poison Spray
body:
# Poison Spray (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Target makes a Con save or takes 1d12 poison damage.

title: Produce Flame
body:
# Produce Flame (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 10 minutes

A flame appears in your hand, shedding bright/dim light. You can hurl it as a ranged spell attack (1d8 fire).

title: Ray of Frost
body:
# Ray of Frost (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Ranged spell attack; 1d8 cold damage and target’s speed is reduced by 10 ft until your next turn.

title: Resistance
body:
# Resistance (Abjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (miniature cloak)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Touch a willing creature; once before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to one saving throw.

title: Sacred Flame
body:
# Sacred Flame (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Target makes a Dex save or takes 1d8 radiant damage; target gains no cover bonus from the save.

title: Shillelagh
body:
# Shillelagh (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (mistletoe, shamrock leaf, club/quaterstaff)
Duration: 1 minute

Imbue a club or quarterstaff; it uses your spellcasting ability for attack/damage and deals 1d8 damage. Weapon becomes magical.

title: Shocking Grasp
body:
# Shocking Grasp (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Melee spell attack; 1d8 lightning damage and target can’t take reactions until the start of its next turn (advantage if target wears metal armor).

title: Spare the Dying
body:
# Spare the Dying (Necromancy cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Stabilize a creature at 0 HP; the target becomes stable.

title: Thaumaturgy
body:
# Thaumaturgy (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: Up to 1 minute

Manifest minor wonders: booming voice, flickering flames, tremors, doors fly open, etc.

title: Thorn Whip
body:
# Thorn Whip (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (plant stem with thorns)
Duration: Instant

Melee spell attack at range; 1d6 piercing damage and pull the creature up to 10 ft closer to you if it’s Large or smaller.

title: True Strike
body:
# True Strike (Divination cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 round

On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target (assuming the spell hasn’t ended).

title: Vicious Mockery
body:
# Vicious Mockery (Enchantment cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Target that can hear you makes a Wis save or takes 1d4 psychic damage and has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn.
